body_html: I think we used to pass these warning flags only for clang, but once we removed all the target_compile_options and instead use CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS (which is really bad), all this nuanced configuration got scrapped
body_text: I think we used to pass these warning flags only for clang, but once we removed all the target_compile_options and instead use CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS (which is really bad), all this nuanced configuration got scrapped
body: I think we used to pass these warning flags only for clang, but once we removed all the `target_compile_options` and instead use `CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS` (which is really bad), all this nuanced configuration got scrapped
